articles.title: Senate approves cuts to NPR; Trump on the Fed : NPR
articles.description: The Senate voted to approve a rescission package that claws back funds allocated for public media and foreign aid. And, President Trump floats the idea of firing the Federal Reserve chair.
articles.content:
Rescission package heads to final vote. And, Trump floats firing the Fed chairman
